Title: Solaris
Writer: Stanislaw Lem (novel), Fridrikh Gorenshteyn (screenplay), Andrei Tarkovsky (screenplay)
Actors: Natalya Bondarchuk, Donatas Banionis, Jüri Järvet, Vladislav Dvorzhetskiy
Plot: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.
